Test case:
Have the Java and Debug perspectives open
Open an editor on JavaBreakpoint in both perspectives.
Set a breakpoint in JavaBreakpoint (on an instance method..breakpoint must be 
installed)
Close Eclipse
Start Eclipse
Launch Eclipse from the Java perspective (DO not explicitly go to the debug 
perspective)

Both debug ui plugins now create their image registries in an asyncExec at 
startup.

Re-opened. Talking with EG the way to do this is to use an alternate 
constructor for ImageRegistry - passing in the default display.
Fixed. Released fix in debug-milestone-3. Please verify.

as well the lazy init of the image descriptor registry.
The ImageRegistry still needs to be created in the ui thread as when it is 
created it hooks on the display dispose and this needs to happen in the ui 
thread.

Verified.
